lead_paragraph: Dr. Jeffrey Lieberman, chairman of psychiatry at Columbia University Medical Center, writes that Dr. Mehmet Oz “has strayed from the strict standards characteristic of the medical field.”

headline.main: Concerns About Dr. Oz: A Clash at Columbia

snippet: Dr. Jeffrey Lieberman, chairman of psychiatry at Columbia University Medical Center, writes that Dr. Mehmet Oz “has strayed from the strict standards characteristic of the medical field.”
